title: Tech Titans Dinner: Trump Hosts AI and Tech Leaders at the White House
description: President Donald Trump will host a dinner at the White House inviting top tech CEOs, such as Apple’s Tim Cook and Meta’s Mark Zuckerberg. Notably absent is Elon Musk due to a public fallout with Trump. The gathering follows a meeting of the new Artificial Intelligence Education task force.
content: The White House is set to host a distinguished dinner on Thursday, bringing together top technology CEOs for an evening with President Donald Trump. The exclusive event, held in the newly renovated Rose Garden, aims to foster discussions with leaders... [585 chars]

title: Trump to host top tech CEOs - except Musk - at White House dinner Thursday
description: The guest list is set to include Microsoft cofounder Bill Gates, Apple CEO Tim Cook, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, and a dozen other executives from the biggest artificial intelligence and tech firms, according to the White House.
content:
One notable absence from the guest list is Elon Musk, once a close ally of Trump, whom the president tasked with running the government-slashing Department of Government Efficiency. Musk had a public break with Trump earlier this year.
The guest list... [2133 chars]

title: Trump to Host Meta’s Zuckerberg, Tech CEOs in Redone Rose Garden
description: Tech industry leaders including Meta Platforms Inc.’s Mark Zuckerberg, Apple Inc.’s Tim Cook, and Microsoft Corp.’s Satya Nadella are expected to attend an artificial intelligence event hosted by First Lady Melania Trump on Thursday and then join President Donald Trump for an evening reception in the newly renovated Rose Garden.

title: NSW government establishes Office for Artificial Intelligence amid productivity crisis
description: An Australian state has made a landmark move in a bid to boost the safe adoption of the controversial technology in the public sector.
content:
The NSW government has established a new Office for Artificial Intelligence.

title: Apple Plans AI-Powered Web Search Tool For Siri To Rival OpenAI, Perplexity
description: Apple Inc. is planning to launch its own artificial intelligence-powered web search tool next year, stepping up competition with OpenAI and Perplexity AI Inc.
content:
Apple Inc. is planning to launch its own artificial intelligence-powered web search tool next year, stepping up competition with OpenAI and Perplexity AI Inc.
